headline.main: New York Times/CBS News Poll Finds Challenges for Next President

snippet: Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump limp into Election Day locked in a tight race and saddled with voters’ unfavorable views of them, according to the latest New York Times/CBS News poll. The poll finds deep challenges awaiting the next presiden...
lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump limp into Election Day locked in a tight race and saddled with voters’ unfavorable views of them, according to the latest New York Times/CBS News poll. The poll finds deep challenges awaiting the next president after a bruising election.
